pages.title: Slider Eye
pages.text: $(#734608)The $(item)Slider Eye$() $(#734608)is dropped by Sliders. It can be crafted into an $(item)Arcane Focus$()$(#734608), which is able to siphon the energy from the $(thing)Arcane Barrier$()$(#734608) and store it inside, destroying the barrier in the process.$()
